SEARCH
Package elpasominersbank

Class BankDatabase

java.lang.Object
elpasominersbank.BankDatabase
public class BankDatabase extends Object
Represents the bank's database, which manages the collection of customer by loading data from the a CSV file, and updating the customer's data to the file. This class also allows inquiring about customers and their accounts.
